short_summary: Independent Authority for creation of permanent military court
description: The document describes the requirement for a reputable and independent authority to aid in the creation of a permanent military court in Canada. The contract period will be 1 year with two (2) six-month option periods.

**Independent Authority Serving the Department of National Defence/CANFORCES**

### Tender Details

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | W6369-23-X043 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | July 21st, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT |
| **Expected Contract Period** | Contract award date to August 21st, 2024 (with two optional 6-month extensions for a total of 28 months) |

The Department of National Defence/Canadian Armed Forces, in collaboration with the Department of Justice, invites expressions of interest for independent authority services to support the development of a permanent military court for Canada.

### Technical and Commercial Requirements
-----------------------------------

Services required include:

* Legal expertise to inform the development of the military court framework
* External perspective to enhance the working group's effectiveness
* Public administration services relating to law courts

### Tenders Can Be Downloaded from [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)
---------------------------------------------------

To facilitate a fair and transparent procurement process, interested parties must access tender documents from the Canadabuys website. Registered users who meet the eligibility criteria can download the tender documents including:

* The Request for Proposal
* The Notice of Proposed Procurement
* Supporting technical papers and annexes

### Contracting Entity Details
---------------------------

* **Name**: Department of National Defence/CANFORCES
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa ON K1A 0K2
* **Contact Person**: Ashley Ratnam (ashley.ratnam@forces.gc.ca)

### Contact Information
-------------------------

To inquire about the tenders or for further information, please contact Ashley Ratnam at (343) 572-6941.

### Important Note
-----------------

The deadline for submission of proposals is strictly on July 21st, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Late proposals will not be accepted.
